alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Cambria; Somerset (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 11:02PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN BEDFORD...SOMERSET AND SOUTHWESTERN CAMBRIA COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1102 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Latrobe to Westmont to near Portage. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Johnstown, Somerset, Westmont, Windber, Ebensburg, Bedford, Belmont, Nanty-Glo, Portage, Geistown, Southmont, Berlin, New Enterprise, Cresson, Gallitzin, Friedens, Vinco, Loretto, Boswell and Dale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for south central and central Pennsylvania.
